text: Former Union Minister and National Conference leader Farooq Abdulla met DMK leader M. Karunanidhi on Tuesday at his residence here. Mr. Karunanidhi presented him some of his books translated into English. “It is a courtesy call. Whenever he visits Chennai he makes a point to call on our leader,” said DMK MP Kanimozhi.
title: Farooq Abdullah meets Karunanidhi
